alert.note: Alert for Eastern Preston; Eastern Tucker; Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston; Western Tucker (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 24 at 8:33AM EST until January 25 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches, with the majority of snow falling between 2 PM and 8 PM. * WHERE...Portions of northwest, southwest, and western Pennsylvania. Portions of northern West Virginia. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 7 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday evening and Tuesday morning commutes. Hazardous driving conditions are especially possible along I 80 on Monday evening. Please travel with care.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Dangerous conditions are expected along Interstate 80 for the next several hours. Remember, `Pull Aside, Stay Alive`.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Preston; Eastern Tucker; Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston; Western Tucker
